timeline.message:
[m2e] more safely refresh entire targetDir

Here we are switching back to refreshing entire build directory
(/target) if and only if we find at least one single resourceDeltaPath
that is a file that is not in the targetDir. This should avoid
the problem we had previously where we had infinite builds.

fixes #4117

Signed-off-by: Gregory Amerson <gregory.amerson@liferay.com>

timeline.bodyText: Doesn't this lose checking executions for different target directories as the removed comment says?
timeline.author: bjhargrave

replies.bodyText: Yes. I discussed with Ray and he agreed this more "course grained" approach would be ok provided we didn't hit the "infinite build" loop problem, which I have tried to address with the new resource delta check.
replies.author: gamerson

replies.bodyText: @bjhargrave you might be right, but @gamerson and I discussed this and this change solves some problems that @kriegfrj reported and it's on me to test if this breaks the use case I documented in the comment.
replies.author: rotty3000

replies.bodyText: OK, as long as you got this! :-)
